      • LoginPushed

        void LoginPushed(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 java.sql.SQLException
        This method is a Button that confirms the log in credentials and checks if they are in the database. Changes into the admin's page scene if the credentials match with the admin's credentials in the database.
        Parameters:
        event - the event
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
